TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed StoreName extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration specifies the X.509 store name, which also includes the type of certificates included. For example, My includes personal certificates, whereas Disallowed includes only revoked certificates.
## Examples The following code example opens an X.509 certificate store, adds and deletes certificates, and then closes the store. It assumes you have three certificates to add to and remove from a local store.
[!code-vb[X509StoreName#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.security.crypto_95_1.vb)] [!code-cs[X509StoreName#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.security.crypto_95_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName AddressBook = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for other users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName AuthRoot = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for third-party certificate authorities (CAs).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName CertificateAuthority = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for intermediate certificate authorities (CAs).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName Disallowed = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for revoked certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName My = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for personal certificates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName Root = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for trusted root certificate authorities (CAs).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName TrustedPeople = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for directly trusted people and resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName TrustedPublisher = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The X.509 certificate store for directly trusted publishers.
